mapper.select: select a.* from (select * from news_info order by created_at)a;
select a.* from (select * from trend_info where search_form = '구글' order by created_at desc limit 10)a order by search_rank;
select * from news_info A left outer join trend_info B on A.news_key = B.search_word where B.search_form = "구글" and search_word = #{ search_word };
